sentences.sContent: Historical science's thinking is practice-animadvert's thinking and metaphysics is abstract thinking.
sentences.sContent_eng: Historical science's thinking is practice-animadvert's thinking and metaphysics is abstract thinking.
sentences.sCn: 历史科学思维是实践批判思维，形而上学是抽象思辨思维。

sentences.sContent: Marx's practice-animadvert theory as a historical science about human being' society developmental course is opposed to metaphysics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Marx's practice-animadvert theory as a historical science about human being' society developmental course is opposed to metaphysics.
sentences.sCn: 马克思的实践批判理论是与形而上学相对立的历史科学，是关于人类社会发展过程的学说。

sentences.sContent: On the basis of freedom for politics and economy neo- liberalists animadvert on the system model of centralism and national intervention and so fight for the system of welfare state.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the basis of freedom for politics and economy neo- liberalists animadvert on the system model of centralism and national intervention and so fight for the system of welfare state.
sentences.sCn: 新自由主义者以政治自由和经济自由为基本出发点，对集权主义和国家干预的制度模式进行批判，反对福利国家的福利制度。
